content: Storage quota successfully set to default.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a success message when setting a storage quota to its default value, typically displayed after a button click or operation in the FilesActionsStore and SpaceQuota components. It informs users that the quota has been successfully reset to its original size.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'default' is transliterated as 'defolt'. It should be translated as 'standart' or 'bədii'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yaddaş kvotası uğurla standart olaraq ayarlandı.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'αποθ.' is an abbreviation for 'αποθηκευτικού χώρου' (storage space). While commonly understood, a more formal and complete spelling improves clarity.

The term 'default' is not accurately translated. 'Լռելյայն' (lrel'yayn) translates to 'silent' or 'implicit,' not 'default.'  'Սանդարժ' (sandarz) or a more descriptive phrase would be more accurate for 'default'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Պահպանման քվոտան հաջողությամբ սահմանվեց սանդարժ։ (Pahp'anman kwotan hachoghut'yamb sahmanvetc sandarz.)  Or a phrase like: Պահպանման քվոտան հաջողությամբ սահմանվեց նախնական արժեքին։ (Pahp'anman kwotan hachoghut'yamb sahmanvetc nakhnakhan arzh'ekin.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ກຳນົດກໍານານບ່ອນເກັບຂໍ້ມູນສຳເລັດແລ້ວຕາມຄ່າເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ' is a bit verbose and not the most natural way to express 'Storage quota successfully set to default.' The phrase 'ກຳນົດກໍານານ' can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເກືອບເຕັມຄໍານິເດືອນສຳເລັດແລ້ວ (Gep teum khano samret laeo)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Limit pamięci został pomyślnie ustawiony na domyślny" is not a direct or ideal translation of "Storage quota successfully set to default."  'Limit pamięci' translates to 'Memory Limit,' which isn't precisely what 'Storage Quota' represents. A better translation would focus on 'quota' or 'przydział' relating to storage capacity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Przydział pamięci został pomyślnie ustawiony na domyślny. / Kwota pamięci została pomyślnie zresetowana do domyślnej.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Limită de stocare este setată cu succes la valorile prestabilite' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. 'Prestabilitite' sounds overly formal in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Limită de stocare a fost resetată la valorile implicite.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'valorile prestabilite' implies a predefined list of values, whereas 'Storage quota successfully set to default' indicates a simple return to the original setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Limită de stocare a fost resetată la valoarea implicită.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ආචයන සලාකය පෙරනිමියට සැකසිණි' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Storage quota successfully set to default.' 'ආචයන' (aachayana) doesn't fit the context and suggests a ritual or offering. 'සලාකය' (salaakaya) generally means 'salve' or 'residue'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of 'ගබඩාවේ ඉඩ ප්‍රමාණය පෙරනිමියට යවා ඇත' (Gabadawe idda pramanya peranimiyata yawa atha) - 'Storage space has been reset to default' or 'ගබඩාවේ ඉඩ ප්රමාණය පෙරනිමියට පිහිටුවන ලදි' (Gabadawe idda pramanya peranimiyata pihituwana ladi) - 'Storage space was established to default'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Kvóta úložiska bola úspešne upravená na predvolené nastavenie' translates to 'Storage quota was successfully modified to the default setting'. The original English says 'set to default', which implies a reset to the initial value, not just a modification. 'Upravená' suggests an alteration, not necessarily a reset.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kvóta úložiska bola úspešne obnovená na predvolené nastavenie.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Складишна' is a misspelling. It should be 'Корисничка'.
While 'помиљавано' is a possible translation for 'default', it can sound slightly awkward. A more natural translation might be 'оснивачки' or 'почетно'.
